body: You can refactor this into a separate method.
You can merge ``` max_value ``` and ``` min_value ``` into a single method as both the methods are almost same.
You can convert these as constants and then use them.

Have a look at these link. It will help you in writing better python code.
1. [Style guide](https://google.github.io/styleguide/pyguide.html)
2. [Logging](https://docs.python.org/3/library/logging.html)
3. [Pdb](https://docs.python.org/3/library/pdb.html)
